title: LF ranked Team Silver - Gold
body:
Hi I am looking for a ranked team not to serious just people looking to have fun and learn the game from each other. I can use Skype and i believe i am skilled at the game just need a team to communicate with.
I main support but can play mid really well also and i can play the other lanes/positions relatively well too.
 
I have a large pool of champs that I can play. 
Support Champs {{champion:412}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:16}}  
Mid Champs {{champion:238}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:25}} 
Other lanes I play very few champs.
PS I'm silver 5 but I believe I am really good at the game so please don't judge me by it. Thanks.
Add me in game - Darkderma
or comment here thanks :)

replies.body:
Add me (HkG Banana Chan)
I main jg and bot :3
